title: Spy Dust: Mafia Romance & Spy Thriller
description: Winner of the 2020 Fiction Awards (for Best Plot Twist) and 2020 Mafia Romance of the Year.A chance encounter with an enigmatic Russian oligarch turns a young woman into the target of a criminal empire. Caught in a web of deceit, greed, and betrayal that stretches from the depths of Russia’s gangland to the Kremlin’s gilded halls, she is forced to forge a perilous alliance with an unlikely protector.From London to Moscow, this thrilling, sensual, and richly textured story transports the reader to the heart of a mafia empire — perfect for fans of dark romance and spine-tingling suspense.Originally published under the title "Russian Gambit".
author: Laureline Ducros
